title: GoodGoods
description: GoodGoods is a comprehensive nutraceuticals brand spanning 50 SKUs across multiple industries. Working with Lonely Ghost's Bronson and Mike Madsen, I developed this vibrant and diverse brand to fit seamlessly in any CPG environment.
_imageNote: Images are auto-detected! Place webp files named: good-goods_1.webp (cover), good-goods_2.webp (gallery), etc.
metrics: Implemented design system across web, print, and social media
Developed brand guidelines for 50+ product SKUs
Created compliant packaging meeting state and federal mandates
Established print processes and merchandise capabilities
Built versatile brand system adaptable across CPG categories
Integrated existing Lonely Ghost logo designed by Bronson Christansen into cohesive brand identity
impact: Created versatile brand system for 50+ SKU product line meeting both creative and regulatory requirements
